'Look, Sho! That cotton candy's huge!'%K%P
'There's the target shooter! There are so many\ndifferent stands!'%K%P
'I don't know where to start!'%K%P
'The stands aren't going anywhere, so let's take\nour time.'%K%P
I looked around the Autumn Festival Inori saved\nas I held her hand while she frolicked like a\nchild.%K%P
After Inori suppressed the typhoon with her\nJinriki, a superior visited Tsubaki.%K%P
They wanted to punish Inori, but we weren't\ngoing to let that happen.%K%P
Akane gathered the people of Kannagi to write\nletters of thanks and petitions beforehand to\npresent to Inori's superior.%K%P
The owner of the kitten, and those who were\nhelped by Inori were among those who wrote\nletters.%K%P
When the superior argued that Inori couldn't\nrehabilitate Akane, Akane responded confidently.%K%P
'My rehabilitation is all done, thanks to\nInori.'%K%P
Akane was rehabilitated and wasn't causing any\nblackouts in order to save Inori from\npunishment.%K%P
Due to the letters from the townspeople and\ncompletion of Akane's rehabilitation, Inori\nfaced no punishments.%K%P
She was given a stern warning and was allowed to\nstay as the goddess of Kannagi.%K%P
And now, Inori and I could enjoy the Autumn\nFestival.%K%P
'We were teased a lot.'%K%P
'But it made me happy because our relationship\nwas recognized by everyone.'%K%P
'That's true. It's embarrassing, but a very\nhappy thing.'%K%P
Inori bashfully smiled holding cotton candy in\none hand and wearing a mask on her head.%K%P
Because she saved the Autumn Festival, everyone\nwas now aware that Inori was their goddess, but\nit didn't affect their relationship.%K%P
They treated her like a normal girl, just like\nbefore.%K%P
'Look, Sho! Caramel apples! Caramel apples!'%K%P
'Welcome, Sho and Inori. You two on a date?'%K%P
'Yes.'%K%P
'Haha, what a show-off. Here's a present for\nboth of you.'%K%P
Inori and I just stared at the caramel apple the\nold man handed us.%K%P
'Are you sure it's okay?'%K%P
'Of course. Here, just take it.'%K%P
'Thank you.'%K%P
After we said thanks, we walked away to take a\nbite.%K%P
'It's sweet and so delicious!'%K%P
I was charmed by Inori's smile. We walked\nthrough the hustle and bustle of the festival.%K%P
'This is amazing.'%K%P
'Hm? What is?'%K%P
'This sight.'%K%P
Everyone who gathered around were smiling and\nhaving a blast.%K%P
'Everyone here is smiling. You're the one who\nsaved their smiles, you know?'%K%P
The Autumn Festival we all gave up on was\nhappening now because of her.%K%P
If this wasn't amazing, I didn't know what was.%K%P
'Really? The festival was able to happen because\nof everyone in this town.'%K%P
'I just created the opportunity for them.'%K%P
'Plus, they all did so much for me as well.'%K%P
Inori was a splendid goddess who never acted\nself-importantly and always acted for the\npeople's happiness.%K%P
'That's your personal virtue, Inori. You should\nbe proud of it.'%K%P
'Yes, I'm very happy as the goddess of this\ntown.'%K%P
I then heard drums being played at the center of\nthe square.%K%P
'Sounds like the taiko drum performance is about\nto happen.'%K%P
'We can participate in the dance too, wanna\ncheck it out?'%K%P
'Of course!'%K%P
'All right, let's go!'%K%P
'Here you go, Sho.'%K%P
Inori grabbed my hand.%K%P
'Sho.'%K%P
'What is it?'%K%P
'I'm looking forward to being with you for many\nyears to come.'%K%P
'I'm looking forward to it too.'%K%P
She was a goddess and my girlfriend.%K%P
Together with her, I kept on loving this town.%K%P
